paper_abstract: We provide a new model theoretic technique for proving 0-1 and convergence laws. As an application, we obtain a new (slightly less computational) proof of convergence laws due to Spencer and Thoma for the probability functions: p(n)(l) = ln(n)/n + l(.)ln(ln(n))/n + c/n.
